title: item sets ingame but not in profile
body: its kinda the same bug i see a lot of people complaining about but backwards. some patches ago i lost all my item sets out of my builder but they still show up when i play a game (only after i reinstalled the game), now you wouldn't think this would be a big deal but it sort of is because if i make new item sets they don't show up in matches, ive been kinda rolling with it for a while now and have submitted a ticket to which i got the equivalent answer of sucks to be you so i was wondering if any one else has encountered this bug or has any other ideas on how to maybe fix it

replies.body:
This may be happening as a result of your Item Sets file that's stored on the server being corrupt. The issue may be able to be resolved by clearing the file on the server, but if this is done, you'll have to recreate all of your item sets from scratch. There's no guarantee this will work, but if you'd like to try this, I suggest working through the steps below:

>First, **log into the game** then navigate to your installation folder, which should be in the following directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

>Delete the folder named **CONFIG**

Once you've deleted the folder, close League out and relaunch/relog back in. Create a test item set, then hop into a custom match to see if it shows up in-game. Let me know if this worked.

I did what you said and while i didn't get my original set back i did get back a new page i was working on
it does show in game and i can live with that thank you for being more helpful than a support ticket il remember to come to the forums first next time.
